description: ResourceClaimSpec defines how a resource is to be allocated.

allocationMode.description: Allocation can start immediately or when a Pod wants to use the resource. "WaitForFirstConsumer" is the default.

parametersRef.description:
ParametersRef references a separate object with arbitrary parameters that will be used by the driver when allocating a resource for the claim.

The object must be in the same namespace as the ResourceClaim.

resourceClassName.description: ResourceClassName references the driver and additional parameters via the name of a ResourceClass that was created as part of the driver deployment.
